headline.print_headline: E-Cigs a 'Consumer-Driven' Revolution Born From a Bad Dream
headline.main: E-Cigs a 'Consumer-Driven' Revolution Born From a Bad Dream

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Hon Lik invented the e-cigarette, a device now shaking up the Big Tobacco industry, he was a pharmacist in China struggling to quit a two-to-three pack a day smoking habit.
docs.snippet: Before Hon Lik invented the e-cigarette, a device now shaking up the Big Tobacco industry, he was a pharmacist in China struggling to quit a two-to-three pack a day smoking habit.
